front.title: Communicating Warning Information in HTTP APIs

abstract.t: This document defines a new HTTP header field Content-Warning and a standard response format for representing warning information in HTTP APIs. Note to Readers This draft should be discussed on the rfc-interest mailing list (<https://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/ietf-http-wg/>). Online access to all versions and files is available on GitHub (<https://github.com/dret/I-D/tree/master/http-warning>).
